ctx: intros A B f l1 l2 H.
exceptions.exn: The reference IHHpermutation was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros A B f l1 l2 H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros A B f l1 l2 H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation (a :: l1) l2 -> exists l3 l4 : list A, l2 = l3 ++ a :: l4 /\\ permutation l1 (l3 ++ l4)" on hypothesis of type "permutation l2 l1".

ctx: intros A B f l1 l2 H.
exceptions.exn: No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.

original: intros A B f l1 l2 H. induction H. - constructor. - simpl. apply permutation_app_comp. + apply IHHpermutation. + apply permutation_cons_ex in H. destruct H as [l3 [l4 [Hl Hperm]]]. subst. apply permutation_app_swap. + apply permutation_cons_ex in H. destruct H as [l3 [l4 [Hl Hperm]]]. subst. apply permutation_skip. apply permutation_app_swap. apply permutation_inv. apply permutation_app_swap.
